snippet: Emails indicate that environmental regulators consulted Duke Energy before seeking to exclude citizen activists from talks to settle charges over groundwater pollution.
abstract: Emails indicate that environmental regulators in North Carolina consulted Duke Energy in 2013 before seeking to exclude citizen activists from talks to settle charges over groundwater pollution.
lead_paragraph: Emails indicate that environmental regulators consulted Duke Energy before seeking to exclude citizen activists from talks to settle charges over groundwater pollution.

headline.main: Emails Link Duke Energy and North Carolina
headline.print_headline: Emails Link Duke Energy and State
